original_title: That Man Is Dangerous: The Birth of Takeshi Kitano
overview: Documentary with Makoto Ashikawa, who played Kikuchi in Violent Cop, and Masayuki Mori, the film's producer, commenting on the film and what was happening behind the scenes of Takeshi Kitano's first film as a director.
title: That Man Is Dangerous: The Birth of Takeshi Kitano
